Title: Booth
Description: Submit a booth to show off a project

Sections.Title: Project Description
Sections.Placeholder: Enter a short description for your project...

Sections.Title: Project Link
Sections.Placeholder: Enter a Modrinth, CurseForge, or source link...

Sections.Title: Project Collaborators
Sections.Placeholder: If anyone helped you with this project, enter their names here...

Sections.Title: Extra Booth Info
Sections.Placeholder: Enter any important information about your booth that you'd like us to know...

Queries.Title: Integrate your project with Arch-Ex 2?
Queries.Message: *Architecture Extensions* adds many interesting block shapes. Integrating with this mod is usually for cosmetic blocks that you'd like in new shapes.

Choices.Title: Yes; the organizers should integrate it
